titleStmt.title: Vicissitudes progress, with its convoy through the counties of Essex, Kent, Surrey, Sussex, and Middlesex, to Westminster and to London. By way of premonstration.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Laurence Chapman, and are to be sold at his shop, next door to the Fountain Tavern in the Strand, near the Savoy,

notesStmt.note: The words "Essex, .. Surrey," and "Sussex, and Middlesex," are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, next door to the Fountain Tavern in the Strand, near the Savoy
